channel.title: Web3 Security Paper Digest
channel.description: Curated papers on Web3, blockchain, and smart contract security from ArXiv and ACL

item.title: UEChecker: Detecting Unchecked External Call Vulnerabilities in DApps via Graph Analysis
item.description:
Summary

  • Proposes UEChecker, a deep-learning tool that detects unchecked external call vulnerabilities in DApps using call-graph analysis and Graph Convolutional Networks.
  • Introduces modules: edge prediction to reconstruct node/edge features, node aggregation for structural context, and a Conformer Block (multi-head attention + convolution + feedforward) to capture multi-scale dependencies.
  • Evaluated on 608 DApps, achieving 87.59% accuracy and outperforming baselines (GAT, LSTM, GCN) for this vulnerability class.

Paper Type

  • Research

Additional Information

  • Authors: ['Dechao Kong', 'Xiaoqi Li', 'Wenkai Li']
  • Tags: ['smart-contracts', 'vulnerability-detection', 'graph-neural-networks', 'unchecked-external-call']
